value.stringValue: The Case_Closure_Notification-9 invocable process failed to start because no records in your org match the record Id specified. In the entities that invoke Case_Closure_Notification-9, such as other processes, check the value for this input: SObjectId.

The Case_Closure_Notification-9 invocable process failed to start because a valid value wasn't found. This can happen when entities that invoke Case_Closure_Notification-9, such as other processes, don't have values for either the SObject or SObjectId. For example: -An SObject or SObject ID wasn't specified. -A value might have been included, but it was null at runtime.

rightValue.stringValue: CIBSA-Transactional Products and Services-International Trade Services-Cross Border CoE

Flow.description: SGPRT-1112, SGPRT-1497 Process to handle Service Case Closure Notifications
Flow.label: Case Closure Notification
